en: hello
i am torpejo from the munchers' guild
we saw your application and have decided to let you join the guild
bravo, champ
come see us at the guild and you can begin training
see you there
thank you for coming to the muncher's guild
i will be helping you on your journey to becoming the BIGGEST muncher
first, we must head outside
i will assist you in catching your very first munchme
munchmes are little guys that we munchers use for doing our dirty work
let us go, newcomer. i will be waiting for you outside
this spot usually has some good munchmes roaming around
though i'm not really seeing any...
oh look, it's a dipshit
how about you go over there and attempt to catch it
don't worry about failing
dipshits don't move much so you can try as many times as you want
use left click on your mouse when you're near him!
sick, you caught it. good job
now try deploying your dipshit from your tummy viewer
open it by pressing the E key
now send it out by dragging it to the arrow icon
there you go
you can toggle your mouse cursor at any time using Q
you can also switch who you are controlling with TAB
drag the top of any view to move it around your screen
click the close button to call your munchme back
dipshit can run and jump. and that's about it
you know what
let's put your new munchme to the test
bring him out again
if it can escape the cage before time runs out
you can keep it.
good luck
too bad
i will be confiscating your dipshit
i believe you can find a better munchme
bye
